name.jp: OMGカメレオンハット(ブルー)

description.en: A tacky blue cap worthy of the coolest occasions. Increases all stats by 5.
description.ar: A tacky blue cap worthy of the coolest occasions. Increases all stats by 5.
description.br: Um brega gorro azul digno das ocasiões mais legais.
description.cns: 一顶俗气的蓝色帽子，值得最酷的场合。将所有属性增加 5。
description.de: Ein lustiger Chamäleon Hut in blau. Alle Stats +5.
description.fi: A tacky blue cap worthy of the coolest occasions. Increases all stats by 5.
description.fil: A tacky blue cap worthy of the coolest occasions. Increases all stats by 5.
description.id: Topi biru norak yang layak untuk acara-acara paling keren. Meningkatkan all stats 5.
description.it: A tacky blue cap worthy of the coolest occasions. Increases all stats by 5.
description.jp: 防御力1～1、力+5、敏捷性+5、知能+5、体力+5
description.kr: 가장 멋진 행사에 어울리는 끈적한 파란색 캡. 모든 능력치가 5만큼 증가합니다.
description.nl: A tacky blue cap worthy of the coolest occasions. Increases all stats by 5.
description.pl: A tacky blue cap worthy of the coolest occasions. Increases all stats by 5.
description.sp: Una gorra azul hortera digna de las ocasiones más increíbles. Aumenta todas las estadísticas en 5.
description.sw: A tacky blue cap worthy of the coolest occasions. Increases all stats by 5.
description.th: หมวกแก๊ปสีน้ำเงินที่ไม่มีรสนิยมที่ดีคู่ควรกับโอกาสที่เจ๋งที่สุด เพิ่มstatทั้งหมด 5
description.vi: Một chiếc mũ lưỡi trai màu xanh da trời phù hợp với những dịp tuyệt vời nhất. Tăng tất cả các chỉ số lên 5.
